author: Staff Reporter
text: The police have registered a case against ruling AINRC MLA P. Karthikeyan for violation of model code of conduct in run up to the Assembly elections. Police said Mr. Karthikeyan had indulged in door-to-door canvassing after the stipulated time of campaigning from 6 a.m. to 10 p.m. The police have booked a case against Mr. Karthikeyan and 75 supporters based on a complaint lodged by a Flying squad.
title: Case against MLA for poll code violation
